info.description: This API is the implementation of my solution for my application's challenge on Strider
info.title: Strider GIS Challenge API

tags.name: Vegetation Cover Request
tags.description: API for requesting and return Vegetation coverage calculations

filename.description: The filename of the scene file used (for reference).

cover.description: The vegetation cover for the given scene (0.0 to 1.0).

area.description: Area of the inspected site in square kilometers.

centroid.description:
GeoJSON (as of RFC 7946) Point Geometry object for the centroid of
                              the inspected site. Note that the GeoJSON RFC spec mandates that
                              coordinates be in lon,lat order and in the WGS84 (EPSG:4326)
                              CRS (Coordinate Reference System).

local_time.description: Timestamp of the capture in local time, in ISO 8601 format.
